content: Canceling construction will prevent partner move-in, reclaim the construction site, and return materials. Are you sure you want to cancel? (In Testing)
Insufficient backpack space. Please organize and try again. (Testing)
test(Learning to create blueprints... Designing the opening mechanism... Contemplating the placement... Creating furniture together with companions)

Turning anticipation into action,
At last, together with <color=#8AAB4B>{NPC}</color>,
We've successfully crafted <color=#8AAB4B>{家具}</color>!

Unfolding the blueprint, scanning through the list,
The next construction target is—
<color=#8AAB4B>{建造目标}</color>!

Finally, <color=#8AAB4B>{NPC}</color>'s dream home checklist
is complete!
A perfect home, a sanctuary for the soul~

Turning anticipation into action,
At last, together with <color=#8AAB4B>{NPC}</color>,
We've completed crafting the <color=#8AAB4B>{家具}</color>!

The materials are ready,
The construction team is on site,
<color=#8AAB4B>Tomorrow</color>, we'll see <color=#8AAB4B>{NPC2}</color>'s home completely transformed!

Through our harmonious collaboration,
we've crafted a <color=#8AAB4B>{家具}</color>!
<color=#8AAB4B>{NPC}</color> moved so quickly and already placed it in the house!

Like a perfectly synchronized duet, our collaboration with <color=#8AAB4B>{NPC}</color> has brought <color=#8AAB4B>{家具}</color> to life!
What shall we create next?
